question.en: In what orientation should the camera be in? Landscape or portait?

answer.en: Please shoot your item in landscape orientation, rather than portait. This will ensure that the entire width of the screen is filled with video.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: What resolution should my video be?

answer.en: We would greatly appreciate that videos are between 720 to 1080 in resolutions. Videos that are shot in 4k may be too large to be streamed over Zoom.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: How many items can I provide and how long can an item be?

answer.en: Please provide one item and make sure it is at a maximum length of 5 minutes.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: Is there a cutoff date for items to be submitted?

answer.en: Yes there is! The cutoff date for items to be submitted is ## September 2021.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e uso po o se tuafafine.

question.en: Will my item be shown on the night of the fiafia?

answer.en: We want to include as many of your performances that we can. Please send through your songs, dances, skits, poetry readings and other talents! We hope that many brothers and sisters will contribute to the evening.
answer.sm: O se tali ua saunia e taliina ai le fesili ua lāgā e uso po o se tuafafine.
